column2: You look weird. Who are you?
This is ugly, just like you.
Don't give me this stuff you're so weird.
Um, ok? Not sure why you gave me this.
You're not so bad, you know that?
OH! This is great! I guess you are good on the inside.
My mom says not to talk to strangers.$You're strange.
column3: You know, out of all the kids, I'm the oldest. That makes me the best!
column4: Avery is SO weird. He's always asking the strangest questions.$His siblings are okay, though.
